extensionDescription.message: An extension that allow user control video slice and play

noVideo.message: No video information on the current page

alertMessage.message: End time can not greater than video duration

popupHint.message: Please open the extension in brower sidepanel

setStartNow.description: button to set start time to current playback time

setEndNow.description: button to set end time to current playback time

errorInvalidTimeFormat.message: Invalid time format. Use MM:SS or HH:MM:SS
errorInvalidTimeFormat.description: error message when time input format is invalid

errorGetCurrentTime.message: Unable to read current playback time. Make sure a video is playing.
errorGetCurrentTime.description: error message when current time cannot be retrieved

errorStartGreaterThanEnd.message: Start time cannot be greater than end time
errorStartGreaterThanEnd.description: error message when start time > end time

errorTimeExceedsDuration.message: Start time or end time cannot exceed video duration
errorTimeExceedsDuration.description: error message when time exceeds video duration

successSegmentAdded.description: success message when segment is added

successNotesSaved.description: success message when notes are saved
